about_the_game:
Looking for an intimidating monster to make an epic battle? Look no further than Otani’s high-quality fantasy pixel art series! Proudly introducing Vol.3!

This is a nice to have pack for creators looking to make an epic-looking world or story!
This Enemy Pack includes 60 different types of pixel art of fantasy enemies, from common to legendary monsters. These would definitely make your world more vivid than ever!

Included materials
＜Graphics＞
This package contains 60 types of pixel art data - 3 small, 4 medium, and 3 large type monsters, including iconic ones like Gargoyle, Devil Lord, Chimera, etc. Each monster type contains
6 types of color and detail variations, totaling up to 60 sets of pixel art! Each set also has two sizes to suit all your battle needs!

＜Reference＞
────────────────────────

────────────────────────

Recommended purchasing this pack in conjunction with other Otani’s packs to maintain a consistent art style and enhance the realism of your game!


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
